backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining supporter request workflow, supporter management, and user profile storage with access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human‑written summaries of all major frontend files for documentation or build analysis.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and applying global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, age gate wrapper, and application layout.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age‑verification wrapper that blocks the app until users confirm they are 18 or older using localStorage.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Handles authentication UI, profile navigation, and admin-claim actions using Internet Identity and actor queries.
frontend/src/components/community/Linkif: Renders text with linkified URLs and embedded video tokens while preserving whitespace.
frontend/src/components/community/Modera: Shows and manages the moderation queue, allowing approval or rejection of flagged posts.
frontend/src/components/community/PollCa: Displays an individual poll with voting UI, results, and supporter badges.
frontend/src/components/community/PollsS: Lists polls and provides a form for authenticated users to create new polls with validation.
frontend/src/components/community/PostAc: Provides edit and delete controls for posts with dialogs to update title, body, and author name or confirm deletion.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Displays comments for a post, handles loading, backend errors, and allows authenticated users to submit new comments.
frontend/src/components/community/PostIm: Converts raw image bytes into a blob URL and renders an attached post image.
frontend/src/components/community/PostLi: Shows post like count and lets authenticated users like or unlike a post with backend error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PostVi: Renders a video attachment using a direct streaming URL from an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/community/VideoE: Embeds allowlisted video providers in a responsive 16:9 iframe.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main page layout with header, navigation, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Displays a centered loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Provides responsive navigation with desktop links and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/profiles/AvatarU: Lets users upload, preview, change, or remove profile avatars with validation and blob conversion.
frontend/src/components/profiles/EditPro: Editable profile form allowing users to update display info, avatar, links, plushie images, and visibility settings.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Plushie: Component for uploading, previewing, and removing profile image blobs with validation and preview URL management.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Profile: Displays a grid of plushie images using their direct URLs.
Renders a list of external profile links with normalized URLs and icons.
frontend/src/components/supporter/Suppor: Shows a styled supporter badge with a heart icon.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines the Article interface and provides an array of article metadata and content.
frontend/src/content/events.ts: Empty module placeholder for future event content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and follow data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for posts and moderation operations, using an actor to fetch, create, edit, and delete posts with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Hook that checks if a static asset URL is reachable using a cached React Query request.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupporterQueries.t: React Query hooks for supporter data, including fetching supporters, submitting requests, and approving supporter profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining a light-themed color palette and global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that initializes React, wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static page describing the site's mission, community values, offerings, and guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AdultPacifierBrandsPa: Page listing adult pacifier brands with descriptions and specialties in a card grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Page that displays a full article based on URL slug, with navigation back to the articles list.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of article cards with category, read time, and preview text, linking to individual article pages.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Implements a full community board with post listing, creation, editing, media attachments, comments, likes, and moderation features.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form that opens an email client and provides a copy‑to‑clipboard email option.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Lists community events and provides a form for authenticated users to create new events with validation.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a grid of static gallery images with titles and descriptions in card layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, branding, navigation links, and promotional content for community features.
frontend/src/pages/PlushieBrandsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of curated plushie brands with names, specialties, and descriptions using card components.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows an individual user profile with avatar, follow/like actions, editing mode, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Lists public community profiles with avatars and bios, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Allows users to submit supporter requests and admins to approve or revoke them, with status lists and validation.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Normalizes backend error messages into user-friendly text and sanitizes technical details.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Provides utilities for validating, converting, and formatting image files for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/linkifyText.ts: Parses text for URLs, normalizes them, and outputs text, link, or video tokens including YouTube/Vimeo embeds.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Converts File objects to bytes or ExternalBlob, and handles preview URL creation and cleanup for profile images.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetCheck.ts: Checks reachability of a static asset using HEAD with a GET fallback and returns a boolean result.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence and hash support.
frontend/src/utils/videoAttachment.ts: Validates video uploads against type and size limits and includes a helper for formatting file sizes.
frontend/src/utils/videoEmbeds.ts: Detects YouTube or Vimeo URLs and returns embed descriptors with provider, embed URL, and video ID.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing profile-related features, and pending requests for implementing user profiles.
